remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是等效的泛型类。The class is the generic equivalent of the class. 它实现了所需使用作为动态增加其大小的数组的泛型接口。It implements the generic interface by using an array whose size is dynamically increased as required. 您可以将项添加到通过使用或方法。You can add items to a by using the or methods. 类使用相等比较器和排序比较器。The class uses both an equality comparer and an ordering comparer. - 等方法， ， ，和列表元素使用相等比较器。Methods such as , , , and use an equality comparer for the list elements. 类型的默认相等比较器`T`确定，如下所示。The default equality comparer for type `T` is determined as follows. 如果类型`T`实现泛型接口，则相等比较器是接口; 方法的默认相等比较器是为。If type `T` implements the generic interface, then the equality comparer is the method of that interface; otherwise, the default equality comparer is . - 等方法和排序比较器用于列表元素。Methods such as and use an ordering comparer for the list elements. 类型的默认比较器`T`确定，如下所示。The default comparer for type `T` is determined as follows. 如果类型`T`实现泛型接口，则默认比较器是方法的接口; 否则为如果类型`T`实现非泛型接口，则默认值比较器是该接口的方法。If type `T` implements the generic interface, then the default comparer is the method of that interface; otherwise, if type `T` implements the nongeneric interface, then the default comparer is the method of that interface. 如果类型`T`实现两个接口，则没有默认比较器，必须显式提供的比较器或比较委托。If type `T` implements neither interface, then there is no default comparer, and a comparer or comparison delegate must be provided explicitly. 不保证排序。The is not guaranteed to be sorted. 您必须进行排序之前执行的操作 (如)，需要进行排序。You must sort the before performing operations (such as ) that require the to be sorted. 可以使用整数索引访问此集合中的元素。Elements in this collection can be accessed using an integer index. 在此集合中的索引都是从零开始的。Indexes in this collection are zero-based. **仅限.NET framework:** 对于非常大对象，可以通过设置增加到 20 亿元素在 64 位系统上的最大容量`enabled`的属性[ `` ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/gcallowverylargeobjects-element.md) configuration 元素`true`中运行时环境。**.NET Framework only:** For very large objects, you can increase the maximum capacity to 2 billion elements on a 64-bit system by setting the `enabled` attribute of the [``](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/gcallowverylargeobjects-element.md) configuration element to `true` in the run-time environment. 接受`null`是有效的引用值类型以及允许重复的元素。 accepts `null` as a valid value for reference types and allows duplicate elements. 不可变版本类，请参阅。For an immutable version of the class, see . ## 性能注意事项Performance Considerations 在决定是否使用或类，两者都具有类似的功能，请记住，类在大多数情况下更好地执行，并是类型安全的。In deciding whether to use the or class, both of which have similar functionality, remember that the class performs better in most cases and is type safe. 如果引用类型用于类型`T`的类，两个类的行为是完全相同。If a reference type is used for type `T` of the class, the behavior of the two classes is identical. 但是，如果值类型用于类型`T`，您需要考虑实现和装箱问题。However, if a value type is used for type `T`, you need to consider implementation and boxing issues. 如果值类型用于类型`T`，则编译器将生成的实现专门针对该值类型的类。If a value type is used for type `T`, the compiler generates an implementation of the class specifically for that value type. 这意味着一个列表元素的对象不需要进行装箱前可以使用该元素，并且创建大约 500 个列表元素后保存未装箱列表元素的内存大于用来生成的类实现的内存。That means a list element of a object does not have to be boxed before the element can be used, and after about 500 list elements are created the memory saved not boxing list elements is greater than the memory used to generate the class implementation. 确保用于类型的值类型`T`实现泛型接口。Make certain the value type used for type `T` implements the generic interface. 如果不，等的方法必须调用框受影响的列表元素的方法。If not, methods such as must call the method, which boxes the affected list element. 如果值类型实现接口，并且您拥有源代码，还实现泛型接口，以防止和中装箱列表元素的方法。If the value type implements the interface and you own the source code, also implement the generic interface to prevent the and methods from boxing list elements. 如果您不拥有的源代码，则传递对象传递给和方法If you do not own the source code, pass an object to the and methods 它是为您带来益处，若要使用的特定于类型的实现类而不是使用类或自己编写强类型化的包装集合。It is to your advantage to use the type-specific implementation of the class instead of using the class or writing a strongly typed wrapper collection yourself. 原因是您的实现必须执行什么.NET 框架的用途，且公共语言运行时可以共享 Microsoft 中间语言代码和元数据，您的实现不能。The reason is your implementation must do what the .NET Framework does for you already, and the common language runtime can share Microsoft intermediate language code and metadata, which your implementation cannot. ## F#注意事项F# Considerations 类用于不常在F#代码。The class is used infrequently in F# code. 相反，[列出了](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/83102799-f251-42e1-93ef-64232e8c5b1d)，这是不可变、 单向链接列表，通常最好是。Instead, [Lists](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/83102799-f251-42e1-93ef-64232e8c5b1d), which are immutable, singly-linked lists, are typically preferred. F#列表提供有序的、 不可变的一系列值，并支持在函数式开发中使用。An F# List provides an ordered, immutable series of values, and is supported for use in functional-style development. 通过F#，则类通常将按引用[ResizeArray\<不 >](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ee353447.aspx)类型缩写，以避免命名冲突与F#列出了When used from F#, the class is typically referred to by the [ResizeArray\<'T>](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ee353447.aspx) type abbreviation to avoid naming conflicts with F# Lists ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何添加、 删除和插入中的简单业务对象。The following example demonstrates how to add, remove, and insert a simple business object in a . (有关的示例复杂类型，请参阅方法。)(For an example of a of complex types, see the method.) 默认构造函数用于具有默认容量创建字符串的列表。The default constructor is used to create a list of strings with the default capacity. 显示属性，然后方法用于将添加多个项。The property is displayed and then the method is used to add several items. 会列出项目，并属性显示同样，与属性，以显示根据需要是否增加容量。The items are listed, and the property is displayed again, along with the property, to show that the capacity has been increased as needed. 方法用于测试的列表中的项是否存在方法用于插入新项中间列表中，然后再次显示列表的内容。The method is used to test for the presence of an item in the list, the method is used to insert a new item in the middle of the list, and the contents of the list are displayed again. 默认值使用属性 （C# 中为索引器） 来检索项，方法用于删除重复项之前，添加的第一个实例，并再次显示内容。The default property (the indexer in C#) is used to retrieve an item, the method is used to remove the first instance of the duplicate item added earlier, and the contents are displayed again. 方法始终会删除它遇到的第一个实例。The method always removes the first instance it encounters. 方法用于减少容量以匹配计数，并和属性将显示。The method is used to reduce the capacity to match the count, and the and properties are displayed. 如果未使用的容量小于 10%的总容量，列表将不具有已调整大小。If the unused capacity had been less than 10 percent of total capacity, the list would not have been resized. 最后，方法用于从列表中，删除所有项并和属性将显示。Finally, the method is used to remove all items from the list, and the and properties are displayed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是元素数目的可以容纳。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 元素添加到，自动增加容量所要求的重新分配内部数组。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估计集合的大小，使用构造函数和指定的初始容量消除了需要执行多个大小调整操作，同时将元素添加到。If the size of the collection can be estimated, using the constructor and specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 可以通过调用减少容量方法或通过设置属性显式。The capacity can be decreased by calling the method or by setting the property explicitly. 减少容量重新分配内存并将中的所有元素都复制。Decreasing the capacity reallocates memory and copies all the elements in the . 此构造函数是 o （1） 操作。This constructor is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的默认构造函数泛型类。The following example demonstrates the default constructor of the generic class. 默认构造函数创建列表，其中默认容量，如下所示通过显示属性。The default constructor creates a list with the default capacity, as demonstrated by displaying the property. 该示例添加、 插入、 和移除项，显示如何容量更改使用这些方法。The example adds, inserts, and removes items, showing how the capacity changes as these methods are used. remarks.format: ## Remarks 将元素复制到读取集合的枚举器的顺序相同。The elements are copied onto the in the same order they are read by the enumerator of the collection. 此构造函数是 O (*n*) 操作，其中*n*是中的元素数`collection`。This constructor is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is the number of elements in `collection`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示构造函数和各种方法的对范围进行操作的类。The following example demonstrates the constructor and various methods of the class that act on ranges. 创建一个字符串数组并将其传递给构造函数中，填充数组的元素列表。An array of strings is created and passed to the constructor, populating the list with the elements of the array. 属性然后会显示，显示的初始容量正好就是需要输入的元素。The property is then displayed, to show that the initial capacity is exactly what is required to hold the input elements. remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是元素数目的可以容纳。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 元素添加到，自动增加容量所要求的重新分配内部数组。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估计集合的大小，指定的初始容量，则无需要执行多个大小调整操作，同时将元素添加到。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 可以通过调用减少容量方法或通过设置属性显式。The capacity can be decreased by calling the method or by setting the property explicitly. 减少容量重新分配内存并将中的所有元素都复制。Decreasing the capacity reallocates memory and copies all the elements in the . 此构造函数是 O (*n*) 操作，其中*n*是`capacity`。This constructor is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is `capacity`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示构造函数。The following example demonstrates the constructor. 一个的容量为 4 的字符串创建，因为列表的最终大小已知恰好为 4。A of strings with a capacity of 4 is created, because the ultimate size of the list is known to be exactly 4. 列表中填充了四个字符串，并且通过使用创建的只读副本方法。The list is populated with four strings, and a read-only copy is created by using the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中元素的顺序将保留在。The order of the elements in the collection is preserved in the . 如果新(当前plus 集合的大小) 将大于，则容量的增加通过自动重新分配要容纳新元素的内部数组和之前添加新元素，现有元素将复制到新数组。If the new (the current plus the size of the collection) will be greater than , the capacity of the is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array to accommodate the new elements, and the existing elements are copied to the new array before the new elements are added. 如果可以容纳新元素而不增加，此方法为 O (*n*) 操作，其中*n*是要添加的元素数。If the can accommodate the new elements without increasing the , this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is the number of elements to be added. 如果需要增加以容纳新元素的容量，此方法将成为 O (*n* + *m*) 操作，其中*n*是元素的数目要添加并*m*是。If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new elements, this method becomes an O(*n* + *m*) operation, where *n* is the number of elements to be added and *m* is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法和各种其他方法的对范围进行操作的类。The following example demonstrates the method and various other methods of the class that act on ranges. 创建一个字符串数组并将其传递给构造函数中，填充数组的元素列表。An array of strings is created and passed to the constructor, populating the list with the elements of the array. 调用方法时，与作为其参数列表。The method is called, with the list as its argument. 结果是列表的当前元素添加到列表中，复制所有元素的末尾。The result is that the current elements of the list are added to the end of the list, duplicating all the elements. summary.span: 返回当前集合的只读 包装器。

span.span: Returns a read-only wrapper for the current collection.

returns.span: 一个对象，作为围绕当前 的只读包装器。

span.span: An object that acts as a read-only wrapper around the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要防止对进行任何修改对象，将其公开只能通过此包装器。To prevent any modifications to the object, expose it only through this wrapper. 一个对象未公开修改集合的方法。A object does not expose methods that modify the collection. 但是，如果对更改基础对象，只读集合反映这些更改。However, if changes are made to the underlying object, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法。The following example demonstrates the method. 一个的容量为 4 的字符串创建，因为列表的最终大小已知恰好为 4。A of strings with a capacity of 4 is created, because the ultimate size of the list is known to be exactly 4. 列表中填充了四个字符串，并方法用于获取一个只读的包装原始列表的泛型接口实现。The list is populated with four strings, and the method is used to get a read-only generic interface implementation that wraps the original list. 原始列表的元素设置为"Coelophysis"使用属性 （索引器在 C# 中），只读列表的内容将显示和再次以证明它只是原始列表的包装器。An element of the original list is set to "Coelophysis" using the property (the indexer in C#), and the contents of the read-only list are displayed again to demonstrate that it is just a wrapper for the original list. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用默认比较器类型`T`以确定列表元素的顺序。This method uses the default comparer for type `T` to determine the order of list elements. 属性检查是否类型`T`实现泛型接口，并使用该实现，如果可用。The property checks whether type `T` implements the generic interface and uses that implementation, if available. 如果不是，检查是否类型`T`实现接口。If not, checks whether type `T` implements the interface. 如果类型`T`不实现任何一个接口，引发。If type `T` does not implement either interface, throws an . 必须已排序根据比较器实现中; 否则，结果是不正确。The must already be sorted according to the comparer implementation; otherwise, the result is incorrect. 比较`null`与任何引用类型允许和不会生成异常时使用泛型接口。Comparing `null` with any reference type is allowed and does not generate an exception when using the generic interface. 排序时，`null`被视为小于任何其他对象。When sorting, `null` is considered to be less than any other object. 如果多个元素具有相同的值，该方法将返回只包含其中一个匹配项，并且它可能会返回任何一个匹配项，不一定是第一个。If the contains more than one element with the same value, the method returns only one of the occurrences, and it might return any one of the occurrences, not necessarily the first one. 如果不包含指定的值，该方法返回一个负整数。If the does not contain the specified value, the method returns a negative integer. 您可以应用于此负整数，以获取大于搜索值的第一个元素的索引的按位求补运算 （~）。You can apply the bitwise complement operation (~) to this negative integer to get the index of the first element that is larger than the search value. 当将值插入到，此索引应使用作为插入点，以保持排序顺序。When inserting the value into the , this index should be used as the insertion point to maintain the sort order. 此方法为 O (log *n*) 操作，其中*n*是范围中的元素数。This method is an O(log *n*) operation, where *n* is the number of elements in the range. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法重载和方法重载。The following example demonstrates the method overload and the method overload. 一个的字符串创建并填充了四个字符串，顺序不分先后。A of strings is created and populated with four strings, in no particular order. 显示、 排序，列表，并再次显示。The list is displayed, sorted, and displayed again. 然后使用方法重载的两个字符串的不是在列表中，搜索和方法用于将它们插入。The method overload is then used to search for two strings that are not in the list, and the method is used to insert them. 返回值方法为负每种情况下，因为字符串不是在列表中。The return value of the method is negative in each case, because the strings are not in the list. 执行按位求补 (~ 运算符在C#和 Visual C++，`Xor`在 Visual Basic 中的为-1) 此负数值的生成大于搜索字符串，并将在此位置中的列表中的第一个元素的索引保留排序顺序。Taking the bitwise complement (the ~ operator in C# and Visual C++, `Xor` -1 in Visual Basic) of this negative number produces the index of the first element in the list that is larger than the search string, and inserting at this location preserves the sort order. 第二个搜索字符串是大于在列表中，任何元素，因此在列表的末尾处的插入位置。The second search string is larger than any element in the list, so the insertion position is at the end of the list. remarks.format: ## Remarks 比较器自定义对元素进行比较。The comparer customizes how the elements are compared. 例如，可以使用作为要执行不区分大小写的字符串搜索的比较器的实例。For example, you can use a instance as the comparer to perform case-insensitive string searches. 如果`comparer`提供的元素为指定的值使用指定比较实现。If `comparer` is provided, the elements of the are compared to the specified value using the specified implementation. 如果`comparer`是`null`，默认比较器检查是否类型`T`实现泛型接口，并使用该实现，如果可用。If `comparer` is `null`, the default comparer checks whether type `T` implements the generic interface and uses that implementation, if available. 如果不是，检查是否类型`T`实现接口。If not, checks whether type `T` implements the interface. 如果类型`T`不实现任何一个接口，引发。If type `T` does not implement either interface, throws . 必须已排序根据比较器实现中; 否则，结果是不正确。The must already be sorted according to the comparer implementation; otherwise, the result is incorrect. 比较`null`与任何引用类型允许和不会生成异常时使用泛型接口。Comparing `null` with any reference type is allowed and does not generate an exception when using the generic interface. 排序时，`null`被视为小于任何其他对象。When sorting, `null` is considered to be less than any other object. 如果多个元素具有相同的值，该方法将返回只包含其中一个匹配项，并且它可能会返回任何一个匹配项，不一定是第一个。If the contains more than one element with the same value, the method returns only one of the occurrences, and it might return any one of the occurrences, not necessarily the first one. 如果不包含指定的值，该方法返回一个负整数。If the does not contain the specified value, the method returns a negative integer. 您可以应用于此负整数，以获取大于搜索值的第一个元素的索引的按位求补运算 （~）。You can apply the bitwise complement operation (~) to this negative integer to get the index of the first element that is larger than the search value. 当将值插入到，此索引应使用作为插入点，以保持排序顺序。When inserting the value into the , this index should be used as the insertion point to maintain the sort order. 此方法为 O (log *n*) 操作，其中*n*是范围中的元素数。This method is an O(log *n*) operation, where *n* is the number of elements in the range. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法重载和方法重载。The following example demonstrates the method overload and the method overload. 该示例定义名为 DinoCompare，实现的字符串将替代比较器`IComparer`(`IComparer(Of String)`在 Visual Basic`IComparer`视觉对象中C++) 泛型接口。The example defines an alternative comparer for strings named DinoCompare, which implements the `IComparer` (`IComparer(Of String)` in Visual Basic, `IComparer` in Visual C++) generic interface. 比较器的工作方式如下：首先，测试比较数是否为`null`，并为 null 引用被视为小于非空。The comparer works as follows: First, the comparands are tested for `null`, and a null reference is treated as less than a non-null. 其次，比较字符串长度，并更长的字符串被认为更高版本。Second, the string lengths are compared, and the longer string is deemed to be greater. 第三，如果长度相等，则使用常规字符串比较。Third, if the lengths are equal, ordinary string comparison is used. 一个的字符串创建并填充了四个字符串，顺序不分先后。A of strings is created and populated with four strings, in no particular order. 列表、 排序使用备用的比较器，并显示再次显示。The list is displayed, sorted using the alternate comparer, and displayed again. 方法重载然后用于搜索将不在列表中，该示例使用的多个字符串。The method overload is then used to search for several strings that are not in the list, employing the alternate comparer. 方法用来插入字符串。The method is used to insert the strings. 这两种方法都位于名为的函数`SearchAndInsert`，以及代码执行按位求补 (~ 运算符在C#和 Visual C++，`Xor`在 Visual Basic 中的为-1) 返回负号并将其用作插入的新字符串的索引。These two methods are located in the function named `SearchAndInsert`, along with code to take the bitwise complement (the ~ operator in C# and Visual C++, `Xor` -1 in Visual Basic) of the negative number returned by and use it as an index for inserting the new string. value.span: 在需要调整大小之前 能够容纳的元素的数目。

span.span: The number of elements that the can contain before resizing is required.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是的元素数的可以存储之前调整大小是必需的而是中的实际的元素数目。 is the number of elements that the can store before resizing is required, whereas is the number of elements that are actually in the . 始终是大于或等于。 is always greater than or equal to . 如果超出了时添加元素，通过在复制旧元素和添加新元素之前自动重新分配内部数组增加容量。If exceeds while adding elements, the capacity is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array before copying the old elements and adding the new elements. 如果容量显著大于计数，并且你想要减少使用的内存，可以通过调用减少容量方法或通过设置显式为较低值的属性。If the capacity is significantly larger than the count and you want to reduce the memory used by the , you can decrease capacity by calling the method or by setting the property explicitly to a lower value. 时的值设置显式，内部数组还重新分配以适应指定的容量，并复制所有元素。When the value of is set explicitly, the internal array is also reallocated to accommodate the specified capacity, and all the elements are copied. 检索此属性的值是 o （1） 的操作;将属性设置为 O (*n*) 操作，其中*n*新容量。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is the new capacity. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检查的容量和计数，其中包含简单的业务对象，说明了如何使用方法以删除额外的容量。The following example demonstrates how to check the capacity and count of a that contains a simple business object, and illustrates using the method to remove extra capacity. remarks.format: ## Remarks 是返回的方法的委托`true`如果该对象传递给委托中定义的条件匹配。The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 当前元素逐个传递给委托，然后处理已停止时找到匹配项。The elements of the current are individually passed to the delegate, and processing is stopped when a match is found. 此方法执行线性搜索;因此，此方法为 O (*n*) 操作，其中*n*是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示并上的方法，其中包含实现的简单业务对象。The following example demonstrates the and methods on a that contains a simple business object that implements . [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Generic.List.ContainsExists#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.list.containsexists/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Generic.List.ContainsExists#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.list.containsexists/vb/module1.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示方法和其他几种方法使用泛型委托。The following example demonstrates the method and several other methods that use the generic delegate. 一个的字符串创建，包含 8 个恐龙名称，其中 （位于位置 1 和 5） 两个以"saurus"结尾。A of strings is created, containing 8 dinosaur names, two of which (at positions 1 and 5) end with "saurus". 该示例还定义一个名为搜索谓词的方法`EndsWithSaurus`、，它接受字符串参数和返回一个布尔值，该值指示是否以"saurus"结尾的输入的字符串。The example also defines a search predicate method named `EndsWithSaurus`, which accepts a string parameter and returns a Boolean value indicating whether the input string ends in "saurus". ， ，并方法用于在列表中搜索与搜索谓词方法，然后方法用于删除以"saurus"结尾的所有项。The , , and methods are used to search the list with the search predicate method, and then the method is used to remove all entries ending with "saurus". 最后，调用方法。Finally, the method is called. 它从开始时，将每个元素传递给反过来将遍历列表`EndsWithSaurus`方法。It traverses the list from the beginning, passing each element in turn to the `EndsWithSaurus` method. 搜索停止，并且该方法返回`true`如果`EndsWithSaurus`方法将返回`true`的任何元素。The search stops and the method returns `true` if the `EndsWithSaurus` method returns `true` for any element. 方法将返回`false`因为已删除所有此类元素。The method returns `false` because all such elements have been removed. > [!NOTE] > 在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中，它不需要创建`Predicate`委托 (`Predicate(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中) 显式。In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the `Predicate` delegate (`Predicate(Of String)` in Visual Basic) explicitly. 这些语言推断从上下文正确的委托，并自动创建。These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically. ## Remarks 是返回的方法的委托`true`如果该对象传递给委托中定义的条件匹配。The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 当前元素逐个传递给委托，在中向前移动，从第一个元素开始和结束的最后一个元素。The elements of the current are individually passed to the delegate, moving forward in the , starting with the first element and ending with the last element. 当找到匹配项时，停止处理。Processing is stopped when a match is found. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在搜索时包含值类型的列表，请确保该类型的默认值不满足搜索谓词。When searching a list containing value types, make sure the default value for the type does not satisfy the search predicate. 否则，没有任何方式来区分一个默认值，该值指示已找到任何匹配项和一个列表元素，它恰好有类型的默认值。Otherwise, there is no way to distinguish between a default value indicating that no match was found and a list element that happens to have the default value for the type. 如果默认值满足搜索谓词，则使用方法相反。If the default value satisfies the search predicate, use the method instead. 此方法执行线性搜索;因此，此方法为 O (*n*) 操作，其中*n*是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is . ## Examples 以下示例演示包含简单上下文对象的 上的 方法。The following example demonstrates the method on a that contains a simple complex object. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Generic.List.ContainsExists#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.list.containsexists/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Generic.List.ContainsExists#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.list.containsexists/vb/module1.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示的查找方法类。The following example demonstrates the find methods for the class. 有关示例类包含`book`类的对象`Book`，使用的数据进行[示例 XML 文件：图书 (LINQ to XML)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94252daf-6097-4625-afc2-0eb778958d4f)。The example for the class contains `book` objects, of class `Book`, using the data from the [Sample XML File: Books (LINQ to XML)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94252daf-6097-4625-afc2-0eb778958d4f). `FillList`方法在示例中使用[LINQ to XML](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f0fe21e9-ee43-4a55-b91a-0800e5782c13)分析的属性值的值从 XML`book`对象。The `FillList` method in the example uses [LINQ to XML](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f0fe21e9-ee43-4a55-b91a-0800e5782c13) to parse the values from the XML to property values of the `book` objects. 下表描述了为 find 方法提供的示例。The following table describes the examples provided for the find methods. |方法Method|示例Example| |------------|-------------| ||查找 ID 使用书`IDToFind`谓词委托。Finds a book by an ID using the `IDToFind` predicate delegate.

C# 示例使用匿名委托。C# example uses an anonymous delegate.| ||查找所有丛书，其`Genre`属性是"计算机"使用`FindComputer`谓词委托。Find all books that whose `Genre` property is "Computer" using the `FindComputer` predicate delegate.| ||2001 年，使用之前在发布日期在集合中查找最后一本书`PubBefore2001`谓词委托。Finds the last book in the collection that has a publish date before 2001, using the `PubBefore2001` predicate delegate.

C# 示例使用匿名委托。C# example uses an anonymous delegate.| ||查找的第一个计算机书籍使用索引`FindComputer`谓词委托。Finds the index of first computer book using the `FindComputer` predicate delegate.| ||查找的最后一个的计算机书籍使用索引`FindComputer`谓词委托。Finds the index of the last computer book using the `FindComputer` predicate delegate.| ||集合中的后半部分中第二个查找的第一本计算机书籍索引使用`FindComputer`谓词委托。Finds the index of first computer book in the second half of the collection, using the `FindComputer` predicate delegate.| ||集合中的后半部分中第二个查找的最后一个的计算机书籍索引使用`FindComputer`谓词委托。Finds the index of last computer book in the second half of the collection, using the `FindComputer` predicate delegate.| [!code-csharp[List\`1_Find_Methods#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/list`1_find_methods/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[List\`1_Find_Methods#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/list`1_find_methods/vb/module1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向前的第一个元素开始和结束时间的最后一个元素搜索。The is searched forward starting at the first element and ending at the last element. 是返回的方法的委托`true`如果该对象传递给委托中定义的条件匹配。The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 当前元素逐个传递给委托。The elements of the current are individually passed to the delegate. 委托的签名：The delegate has the signature: ```csharp public bool methodName(T obj) ``` ```vb Public Function methodName(obj As T) As Boolean ``` 此方法执行线性搜索;因此，此方法为 O (*n*) 操作，其中*n*是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is . ## Examples 下面的示例定义`Employee`类的两个字段`Name`和`Id`。The following example defines an `Employee` class with two fields, `Name` and `Id`. 它还定义了`EmployeeSearch`具有单个方法的类`StartsWith`，，该值指示是否`Employee.Name`字段开头的指定子字符串，提供给`EmployeeSearch`类构造函数。It also defines an `EmployeeSearch` class with a single method, `StartsWith`, that indicates whether the `Employee.Name` field starts with a specified substring that is supplied to the `EmployeeSearch` class constructor. 请注意此方法的签名Note the signature of this method ```csharp public bool StartsWith(Employee e) ``` ```vb Public Function StartsWith(e As Employee) As Boolean ``` 对应于可以传递给委托的签名方法。corresponds to the signature of the delegate that can be passed to the method. 该示例实例化`List`对象中，添加了许多`Employee`对象添加到它，，然后调用方法两次搜索整个集合，第一个第一次`Employee`对象，其`Name`字段的开始使用"J"和第二次第一个`Employee`对象，其`Name`字段开头"Ju"。The example instantiates a `List` object, adds a number of `Employee` objects to it, and then calls the method twice to search the entire collection, the first time for the first `Employee` object whose `Name` field begins with "J", and the second time for the first `Employee` object whose `Name` field begins with "Ju". remarks.format: ## Remarks 处开始向前搜索`startIndex`结束时间`startIndex`plus`count`减 1，如果`count`大于 0。The is searched forward starting at `startIndex` and ending at `startIndex` plus `count` minus 1, if `count` is greater than 0. 是返回的方法的委托`true`如果该对象传递给委托中定义的条件匹配。The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 当前元素逐个传递给委托。The elements of the current are individually passed to the delegate. 委托的签名：The delegate has the signature: ```csharp public bool methodName(T obj) ``` ```vb Public Function methodName(obj As T) As Boolean ``` 此方法执行线性搜索;因此，此方法为 O (*n*) 操作，其中*n*是`count`。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is `count`. ## Examples 下面的示例定义`Employee`类的两个字段`Name`和`Id`。The following example defines an `Employee` class with two fields, `Name` and `Id`. 它还定义了`EmployeeSearch`具有单个方法的类`StartsWith`，，该值指示是否`Employee.Name`字段开头的指定子字符串，提供给`EmployeeSearch`类构造函数。It also defines an `EmployeeSearch` class with a single method, `StartsWith`, that indicates whether the `Employee.Name` field starts with a specified substring that is supplied to the `EmployeeSearch` class constructor. 请注意此方法的签名Note the signature of this method ```csharp public bool StartsWith(Employee e) ``` ```vb Public Function StartsWith(e As Employee) As Boolean ``` 对应于可以传递给委托的签名方法。corresponds to the signature of the delegate that can be passed to the method. 示例实例化`List`对象中，添加了许多`Employee`对象添加到它，，然后调用两次，以在整个集合中搜索的方法 (即成员从索引 0 到索引-1)。The example instantiates a `List` object, adds a number of `Employee` objects to it, and then calls the method twice to search the entire collection (that is, the members from index 0 to index - 1). 第一次，它会搜索的第一个`Employee`对象，其`Name`字段开头"J"; 第二个时，它会搜索的第一个`Employee`对象，其`Name`字段开头"Ju"。The first time, it searches for the first `Employee` object whose `Name` field begins with "J"; the second time, it searches for the first `Employee` object whose `Name` field begins with "Ju". remarks.format:
## Remarks 是返回的方法的委托`true`如果该对象传递给委托中定义的条件匹配。The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 当前元素逐个传递给委托，向后移动，从最后一个元素开始和结束的第一个元素。The elements of the current are individually passed to the delegate, moving backward in the , starting with the last element and ending with the first element. 当找到匹配项时，停止处理。Processing is stopped when a match is found. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在搜索时包含值类型的列表，请确保该类型的默认值不满足搜索谓词。When searching a list containing value types, make sure the default value for the type does not satisfy the search predicate. 否则，没有任何方式来区分一个默认值，该值指示已找到任何匹配项和一个列表元素，它恰好有类型的默认值。Otherwise, there is no way to distinguish between a default value indicating that no match was found and a list element that happens to have the default value for the type. 如果默认值满足搜索谓词，则使用方法相反。If the default value satisfies the search predicate, use the method instead. 此方法执行线性搜索;因此，此方法为 O (*n*) 操作，其中*n*是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示的查找方法类。The following example demonstrates the find methods for the class. 有关示例类包含`book`类的对象`Book`，使用的数据进行[示例 XML 文件：图书 (LINQ to XML)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94252daf-6097-4625-afc2-0eb778958d4f)。The example for the class contains `book` objects, of class `Book`, using the data from the [Sample XML File: Books (LINQ to XML)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94252daf-6097-4625-afc2-0eb778958d4f). `FillList`方法在示例中使用[LINQ to XML](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f0fe21e9-ee43-4a55-b91a-0800e5782c13)分析的属性值的值从 XML`book`对象。The `FillList` method in the example uses [LINQ to XML](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f0fe21e9-ee43-4a55-b91a-0800e5782c13) to parse the values from the XML to property values of the `book` objects. 下表描述了为 find 方法提供的示例。The following table describes the examples provided for the find methods. |方法Method|示例Example| |------------|-------------| ||查找 ID 使用书`IDToFind`谓词委托。Finds a book by an ID using the `IDToFind` predicate delegate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `foreach`语句的C#语言 (`for each`中C++，`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 隐藏了枚举器的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在此位置上，未定义属性。At this position, the property is undefined. 因此，您必须调用方法将枚举数前移到集合，然后再读取的值的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call the method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 属性返回同一对象，直到调用。The property returns the same object until is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过集合，枚举器的末尾放置在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举数位于此位置上，对后续调用还返回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用到返回`false`，是不确定的。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 无法再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素；必须改为创建新的枚举器实例。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果进行了更改到集合中，例如添加、 修改或删除元素，该枚举数将失效且不可恢复，并且下次调用或引发。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 命名空间中集合的默认实现是不同步的。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该集合的子集或引用类型的集合的浅表副本包含仅对集合的元素的引用。A shallow copy of a collection of reference types, or a subset of that collection, contains only the references to the elements of the collection. 不复制对象本身。The objects themselves are not copied. 新列表中的引用都指向相同的对象中的原始列表的引用。The references in the new list point to the same objects as the references in the original list. 值类型的集合或该集合的子集的浅表副本包含集合的元素。A shallow copy of a collection of value types, or a subset of that collection, contains the elements of the collection. 但是，如果集合中的元素包含对其他对象的引用，不会复制这些对象。However, if the elements of the collection contain references to other objects, those objects are not copied. 在新集合的元素中引用都指向相同的对象中的原始集合的元素的引用。The references in the elements of the new collection point to the same objects as the references in the elements of the original collection. 与此相反，集合的深层副本复制这些元素以及由这些元素直接或间接引用的所有内容。In contrast, a deep copy of a collection copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements. 此方法为 O (*n*) 操作，其中*n*是`count`。This method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is `count`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法和其他方法对范围进行操作的类。The following example demonstrates the method and other methods of the class that act on ranges. 在此示例中，末尾方法用于从列表中，从开始的索引位置 2 获取三个项。At the end of the example, the method is used to get three items from the list, beginning with index location 2. 方法调用所产生，创建三个元素的数组。The method is called on the resulting , creating an array of three elements. 将显示数组的元素。The elements of the array are displayed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 接受`null`是有效的引用值类型以及允许重复的元素。 accepts `null` as a valid value for reference types and allows duplicate elements. 可以使用下面的语法通过此属性访问集合中的特定元素：`myCollection[index]`。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`. 检索此属性的值是 o （1） 的操作;将属性设置也是 o （1） 操作。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is also an O(1) operation. ## Examples 在本部分中的示例演示属性 （C# 中的索引器） 和各种其他属性和方法的泛型类。The example in this section demonstrates the property (the indexer in C#) and various other properties and methods of the generic class. 列表后创建和使用填充方法中，元素将检索，显示使用属性。After the list has been created and populated using the method, an element is retrieved and displayed using the property. (有关的示例，使用属性来设置元素的值列表，请参阅。)(For an example that uses the property to set the value of a list element, see .) > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic 中， C#，和C++所有具有访问语法而无需使用其名称的属性。Visual Basic, C#, and C++ all have syntax for accessing the property without using its name. 相反，变量包含，就好像数组使用。Instead, the variable containing the is used as if it were an array. C#语言中使用[ `this` ](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this.md)关键字来定义而不是实现索引器属性。The C# language uses the [`this`](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this.md) keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 将 实现为默认属性，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. remarks.format: ## Remarks 向后搜索的最后一个元素开始，结束时间的第一个元素。The is searched backward starting at the last element and ending at the first element. 此方法可确定是否使用默认的相等比较的相等为`T`，列表中的值的类型。This method determines equality using the default equality comparer for `T`, the type of values in the list. 此方法执行线性搜索;因此，此方法为 O (*n*) 操作，其中*n*是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示的所有三个重载方法。The following example demonstrates all three overloads of the method. 一个的字符串创建后，显示两次，在索引位置 0 和 5 的索引位置的一个条目。A of strings is created, with one entry that appears twice, at index location 0 and index location 5. 方法重载从结束时，在整个列表中搜索并查找字符串的第二个匹配项。The method overload searches the entire list from the end, and finds the second occurrence of the string. 方法重载用于向后从索引位置 3 开始，然后再向列表的开头，因此会在列表中找到该字符串的第一个匹配项在列表中搜索。The method overload is used to search the list backward beginning with index location 3 and continuing to the beginning of the list, so it finds the first occurrence of the string in the list. 最后，方法重载用于搜索的索引位置 4 开始，往前的四个条目范围 （即，它搜索在位置 4、 3、 2 和 1 项）; 此搜索将返回-1，因为没有搜索的实例在该范围内的字符串。Finally, the method overload is used to search a range of four entries, beginning at index location 4 and extending backward (that is, it searches the items at locations 4, 3, 2, and 1); this search returns -1 because there are no instances of the search string in that range. remarks.format: ## Remarks 是返回的方法的委托`true`如果该对象传递给委托中定义的条件匹配。The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 当前元素逐个传递给委托和与条件匹配的元素将从。The elements of the current are individually passed to the delegate, and the elements that match the conditions are removed from the . 此方法执行线性搜索;因此，此方法为 O (*n*) 操作，其中*n*是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法和其他几种方法使用泛型委托。The following example demonstrates the method and several other methods that use the generic delegate. 一个的字符串创建，包含 8 个恐龙名称，其中 （位于位置 1 和 5） 两个以"saurus"结尾。A of strings is created, containing 8 dinosaur names, two of which (at positions 1 and 5) end with "saurus". 该示例还定义一个名为搜索谓词的方法`EndsWithSaurus`、，它接受字符串参数和返回一个布尔值，该值指示是否以"saurus"结尾的输入的字符串。The example also defines a search predicate method named `EndsWithSaurus`, which accepts a string parameter and returns a Boolean value indicating whether the input string ends in "saurus". ， ，和方法用于在列表中搜索与搜索谓词方法。The , , and methods are used to search the list with the search predicate method. 方法用于删除以"saurus"结尾的所有项。The method is used to remove all entries ending with "saurus". 它从开始时，将每个元素传递给反过来将遍历列表`EndsWithSaurus`方法。It traverses the list from the beginning, passing each element in turn to the `EndsWithSaurus` method. 如果该元素已移除`EndsWithSaurus`方法将返回`true`。The element is removed if the `EndsWithSaurus` method returns `true`. > [!NOTE] > 在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中，它不需要创建`Predicate`委托 (`Predicate(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中) 显式。In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the `Predicate` delegate (`Predicate(Of String)` in Visual Basic) explicitly. 这些语言推断上下文中，从正确的委托，并自动创建。These languages infer the correct delegate from context, and create it automatically. 最后，方法验证是否在列表中没有以"saurus"结尾的字符串。Finally, the method verifies that there are no strings in the list that end with "saurus". remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用默认比较器类型`T`以确定列表元素的顺序。This method uses the default comparer for type `T` to determine the order of list elements. 属性检查是否类型`T`实现泛型接口，并使用该实现，如果可用。The property checks whether type `T` implements the generic interface and uses that implementation, if available. 如果不是，检查是否类型`T`实现接口。If not, checks whether type `T` implements the interface. 如果类型`T`不实现任何一个接口，引发。If type `T` does not implement either interface, throws an . 此方法使用方法，应用内省排序，如下所示：This method uses the method, which applies the introspective sort as follows: - 如果分区大小少于 16 个元素，它使用插入排序算法。If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an insertion sort algorithm. - 如果分区数超过两个日志*n*，其中*n*是范围的输入数组，它使用 Heapsort 算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 log *n*, where *n* is the range of the input array, it uses a Heapsort algorithm. - 否则，它使用快速排序算法。Otherwise, it uses a Quicksort algorithm. 此实现将执行不稳定排序;也就是说，如果两个元素相等，可能不会保留其顺序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 与此相反，一个稳定排序保留相等元素的顺序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 一般情况下，此方法为 O (*n*日志*n*) 操作，其中*n*是; 最坏的情况是 O (*n* 2) 操作。On average, this method is an O(*n* log *n*) operation, where *n* is ; in the worst case it is an O(*n*2) operation. ## Examples 以下示例将添加到某些名称`List`对象，显示未排序顺序，列表会调方法，然后显示已排序的列表。The following example adds some names to a `List` object, displays the list in unsorted order, calls the method, and then displays the sorted list. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Generic.List.Sort#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.list.sort/cs/Sort1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Generic.List.Sort#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.list.sort/vb/Sort1.vb#2)] 下面的代码演示和简单业务对象上的方法重载。The following code demonstrates the and method overloads on a simple business object. 调用方法会导致使用默认比较器的部件类型和使用匿名方法实现方法。Calling the method results in the use of the default comparer for the Part type, and the method is implemented by using an anonymous method. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Generic.List.Sort#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.list.sort/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Generic.List.Sort#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.list.sort/vb/module1.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示方法重载和方法重载。The following example demonstrates the method overload and the method overload. 一个的字符串创建并填充了四个字符串，顺序不分先后。A of strings is created and populated with four strings, in no particular order. 显示、 排序，列表，并再次显示。The list is displayed, sorted, and displayed again. 然后使用方法重载的两个字符串的不是在列表中，搜索和方法用于将它们插入。The method overload is then used to search for two strings that are not in the list, and the method is used to insert them. 返回值方法为负每种情况下，因为字符串不是在列表中。The return value of the method is negative in each case, because the strings are not in the list. 执行按位求补 (~ 运算符在C#和 Visual C++，`Xor`在 Visual Basic 中的为-1) 此负数值的生成大于搜索字符串，并将在此位置中的列表中的第一个元素的索引保留排序顺序。Taking the bitwise complement (the ~ operator in C# and Visual C++, `Xor` -1 in Visual Basic) of this negative number produces the index of the first element in the list that is larger than the search string, and inserting at this location preserves the sort order. 第二个搜索字符串是大于在列表中，任何元素，因此在列表的末尾处的插入位置。The second search string is larger than any element in the list, so the insertion position is at the end of the list. [!code-cpp[List\`1_SortSearch#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_SortSearch/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[List\`1_SortSearch#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_SortSearch/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[List\`1_SortSearch#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_SortSearch/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`comparer`提供的元素使用指定排序实现。If `comparer` is provided, the elements of the are sorted using the specified implementation. 如果`comparer`是`null`，默认比较器检查是否类型`T`实现泛型接口，并使用该实现，如果可用。If `comparer` is `null`, the default comparer checks whether type `T` implements the generic interface and uses that implementation, if available. 如果不是，检查是否类型`T`实现接口。If not, checks whether type `T` implements the interface. 如果类型`T`不实现任何一个接口，引发。If type `T` does not implement either interface, throws an . 此方法使用方法，应用内省排序，如下所示：This method uses the method, which applies the introspective sort as follows: - 如果分区大小少于 16 个元素，它使用插入排序算法。If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an insertion sort algorithm. - 如果分区数超过两个日志*n*，其中*n*是范围的输入数组，它使用 Heapsort 算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 log *n*, where *n* is the range of the input array, it uses a Heapsort algorithm. - 否则，它使用快速排序算法。Otherwise, it uses a Quicksort algorithm. 此实现将执行不稳定排序;也就是说，如果两个元素相等，可能不会保留其顺序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 与此相反，一个稳定排序保留相等元素的顺序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 一般情况下，此方法为 O (*n*日志*n*) 操作，其中*n*是; 最坏的情况是 O (*n* 2) 操作。On average, this method is an O(*n* log *n*) operation, where *n* is ; in the worst case it is an O(*n*2) operation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法重载和方法重载。The following example demonstrates the method overload and the method overload. 该示例定义名为 DinoCompare，实现的字符串将替代比较器`IComparer`(`IComparer(Of String)`在 Visual Basic`IComparer`视觉对象中C++) 泛型接口。The example defines an alternative comparer for strings named DinoCompare, which implements the `IComparer` (`IComparer(Of String)` in Visual Basic, `IComparer` in Visual C++) generic interface. 比较器的工作方式如下：首先，测试比较数是否为`null`，并为 null 引用被视为小于非空。The comparer works as follows: First, the comparands are tested for `null`, and a null reference is treated as less than a non-null. 其次，比较字符串长度，并更长的字符串被认为更高版本。Second, the string lengths are compared, and the longer string is deemed to be greater. 第三，如果长度相等，则使用常规字符串比较。Third, if the lengths are equal, ordinary string comparison is used. 一个的字符串创建并填充了四个字符串，顺序不分先后。A of strings is created and populated with four strings, in no particular order. 列表、 排序使用备用的比较器，并显示再次显示。The list is displayed, sorted using the alternate comparer, and displayed again. 方法重载然后用于搜索将不在列表中，该示例使用的多个字符串。The method overload is then used to search for several strings that are not in the list, employing the alternate comparer. 方法用来插入字符串。The method is used to insert the strings. 这两种方法都位于名为的函数`SearchAndInsert`，以及代码执行按位求补 (~ 运算符在C#和 Visual C++，`Xor`在 Visual Basic 中的为-1) 返回负号并将其用作插入的新字符串的索引。These two methods are located in the function named `SearchAndInsert`, along with code to take the bitwise complement (the ~ operator in C# and Visual C++, `Xor` -1 in Visual Basic) of the negative number returned by and use it as an index for inserting the new string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`comparer`提供的元素使用指定排序实现。If `comparer` is provided, the elements of the are sorted using the specified implementation. 如果`comparer`是`null`，默认比较器检查是否类型`T`实现泛型接口，并使用该实现，如果可用。If `comparer` is `null`, the default comparer checks whether type `T` implements the generic interface and uses that implementation, if available. 如果不是，检查是否类型`T`实现接口。If not, checks whether type `T` implements the interface. 如果类型`T`不实现任何一个接口，引发。If type `T` does not implement either interface, throws an . 此方法使用，其应用内省排序，如下所示：This method uses , which applies the introspective sort as follows: - 如果分区大小少于 16 个元素，它使用插入排序算法If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an insertion sort algorithm - 如果分区数超过两个日志*n*，其中*n*是范围的输入数组，它使用[Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 log *n*, where *n* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm. - 否则，它使用快速排序算法。Otherwise, it uses a Quicksort algorithm. 此实现将执行不稳定排序;也就是说，如果两个元素相等，可能不会保留其顺序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 与此相反，一个稳定排序保留相等元素的顺序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 一般情况下，此方法为 O (*n*日志*n*) 操作，其中*n*是; 最坏的情况是 O (*n* 2) 操作。On average, this method is an O(*n* log *n*) operation, where *n* is ; in the worst case it is an O(*n*2) operation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法重载和方法重载。The following example demonstrates the method overload and the method overload. 该示例定义名为 DinoCompare，实现的字符串将替代比较器`IComparer`(`IComparer(Of String)`在 Visual Basic`IComparer`视觉对象中C++) 泛型接口。The example defines an alternative comparer for strings named DinoCompare, which implements the `IComparer` (`IComparer(Of String)` in Visual Basic, `IComparer` in Visual C++) generic interface. 比较器的工作方式如下：首先，测试比较数是否为`null`，并为 null 引用被视为小于非空。The comparer works as follows: First, the comparands are tested for `null`, and a null reference is treated as less than a non-null. 其次，比较字符串长度，并更长的字符串被认为更高版本。Second, the string lengths are compared, and the longer string is deemed to be greater. 第三，如果长度相等，则使用常规字符串比较。Third, if the lengths are equal, ordinary string comparison is used. 一个的字符串创建并填充一个和示例的名称。A of strings is created and populated with the names of five herbivorous dinosaurs and three carnivorous dinosaurs. 在两个组中，名称不按任何特定的排序顺序。Within each of the two groups, the names are not in any particular sort order. 显示的列表，使用备用的比较器排序该，并再次显示列表。The list is displayed, the range of herbivores is sorted using the alternate comparer, and the list is displayed again. 方法重载然后用于搜索"Brachiosaurus"仅草食范围。The method overload is then used to search only the range of herbivores for "Brachiosaurus". 找不到字符串，并按位求补 (~ 中的运算符C#和 Visual C++，`Xor`在 Visual Basic 中的为-1) 返回负号方法用于插入新的字符串用作索引。The string is not found, and the bitwise complement (the ~ operator in C# and Visual C++, `Xor` -1 in Visual Basic) of the negative number returned by the method is used as an index for inserting the new string. [!code-cpp[List\`1_SortSearchComparerRange#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_SortSearchComparerRange/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[List\`1_SortSearchComparerRange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_SortSearchComparerRange/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[List\`1_SortSearchComparerRange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_SortSearchComparerRange/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建只读集合后，该集合不允许添加、移除或修改元素。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 集合是只读的只是一个集合与可防止修改集合; 的包装器因此，如果对基础集合进行更改，只读集合反映了这些更改。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `foreach`语句的C#语言 (`for each`中C++，`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 隐藏了枚举器的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在此位置上，未定义属性。At this position, the property is undefined. 因此，您必须调用方法将枚举数前移到集合，然后再读取的值的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call the method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 属性返回同一对象，直到调用。The property returns the same object until is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过集合，枚举器的末尾放置在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举数位于此位置上，对后续调用还返回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用到返回`false`，是不确定的。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 无法再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素；必须改为创建新的枚举器实例。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果进行了更改到集合中，例如添加、 修改或删除元素，该枚举数将失效且不可恢复，并且下次调用或引发。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 命名空间中集合的默认实现是不同步的。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间中集合的默认实现是不同步的。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 枚举与写访问的竞争的极少数情况下，可以锁定在整个枚举期间的集合。In the rare case where enumeration contends with write accesses, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 返回一个对象，可用于同步对。 returns an object that can be used to synchronize access to the . 同步是所有线程访问集合之前都锁定此对象时才有效。Synchronization is effective only if all threads lock this object before accessing the collection. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建只读集合后，该集合不允许添加、移除或修改元素。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 集合是只读的只是一个集合与可防止修改集合; 的包装器因此，如果对基础集合进行更改，只读集合反映了这些更改。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于最小化集合的内存开销如果任何新元素将不添加到集合。This method can be used to minimize a collection's memory overhead if no new elements will be added to the collection. 重新分配和复制较大的成本但是，有时会很大，因此方法不会执行任何操作，如果列表为在多个容量的 90%。The cost of reallocating and copying a large can be considerable, however, so the method does nothing if the list is at more than 90 percent of capacity. 这样可以避免产生相对较小增益的大型的重新分配费用。This avoids incurring a large reallocation cost for a relatively small gain. > [!NOTE] > 90%的当前阈值可能会更改在将来的版本。The current threshold of 90 percent might change in future releases. 此方法为 O (*n*) 操作，其中*n*是。This method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is . 若要重置为其初始状态，请在调用方法之前调用方法。To reset a to its initial state, call the method before calling the method. 截去空的容量设置到默认容量。Trimming an empty sets the capacity of the to the default capacity. 也可以使用设置容量属性。The capacity can also be set using the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检查的容量和计数，其中包含简单的业务对象，说明了如何使用方法以删除额外的容量。The following example demonstrates how to check the capacity and count of a that contains a simple business object, and illustrates using the method to remove extra capacity. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Generic.List.CapacityCount#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.list.capacitycount/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Generic.List.CapacityCount#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.list.capacitycount/vb/module1.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示方法。The following example demonstrates the method. 一些属性和方法的类用于添加、 插入和删除字符串的列表项。Several properties and methods of the class are used to add, insert, and remove items from a list of strings. 然后方法用于减少容量以匹配计数，并和属性将显示。Then the method is used to reduce the capacity to match the count, and the and properties are displayed. 如果未使用的容量小于 10%的总容量，列表将不具有已调整大小。If the unused capacity had been less than 10 percent of total capacity, the list would not have been resized. 最后，将清除列表的内容。Finally, the contents of the list are cleared. remarks.format: ## Remarks 是返回的方法的委托`true`如果该对象传递给委托中定义的条件匹配。The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 当前元素逐个传递给委托，并处理在委托返回时已停止`false`的任何元素。The elements of the current are individually passed to the delegate, and processing is stopped when the delegate returns `false` for any element. 元素的处理顺序，并且所有调用都都是单个线程上。The elements are processed in order, and all calls are made on a single thread. 此方法为 O (*n*) 操作，其中*n*是。This method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法和其他几种方法使用泛型委托。The following example demonstrates the method and several other methods that use generic delegate. 一个的字符串创建，包含 8 个恐龙名称，其中 （位于位置 1 和 5） 两个以"saurus"结尾。A of strings is created, containing 8 dinosaur names, two of which (at positions 1 and 5) end with "saurus". 该示例还定义一个名为搜索谓词的方法`EndsWithSaurus`、，它接受字符串参数和返回一个布尔值，该值指示是否以"saurus"结尾的输入的字符串。The example also defines a search predicate method named `EndsWithSaurus`, which accepts a string parameter and returns a Boolean value indicating whether the input string ends in "saurus". 方法开始时，将每个元素传递给又从遍历列表`EndsWithSaurus`方法。The method traverses the list from the beginning, passing each element in turn to the `EndsWithSaurus` method. 搜索将停止何时`EndsWithSaurus`方法将返回`false`。The search stops when the `EndsWithSaurus` method returns `false`. > [!NOTE] > 在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中，它不需要创建`Predicate`委托 (`Predicate(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中) 显式。In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the `Predicate` delegate (`Predicate(Of String)` in Visual Basic) explicitly. 这些语言推断从上下文正确的委托，并自动创建。These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically.
